description: MERN PWA with ReactSpring, JWT and Hidden Admin Backend
This Dungeons & Dragons one stop shop provides everything from rules and resources to world building, dice rolling, and scheduling tools needs for GM play.
A fun interactive map for live game play and game play prep made with JS HTMP and CSS.

How-To-Dot-Help is a website portal connecting potential volunteers with smaller organizations that are looking for the additional help. Users can learn about connected non-for-profits, create bios and send their information to NFPs they want to voluteer for. The site features a MySQL database and two portals based on admin and general user logins.
Worked with IndexedDB, Service-Worker, Manifest, MongoDB Atlas and Heroku to make the existing BudgetTracker code into a live PWA with offline capabilities hosted on Heroku.
A Simple site to help you schedule your day.
